name: Mario
description: Telegram's sassiest group manager. Modular Telegram group management bot!

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable env variables. But, you need to understand the code to know what to set here!

TG_TOKEN.description: Your bot token, as a string.

LOG_CHAT.description: An integer of consisting of your owner ID

LOG_ADMIN.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable webhooks when in env mode messages
